9780465026562.title: Godel, Escher, Bach
highlights: The only way to learn mathematics is to do mathematics.
Pure mathematics is, in its way, the poetry of logical ideas.

9780691160147.title: The Ultimate Quotable Einstein
highlights: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.

9781984898859.title: Little Women
highlights: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.

9780316769532.title: The Catcher in the Rye
highlights: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
